text: Ezɨ Aisaia akar ababanir mam isa Hesekia ganɨga, kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia kamaghɨn ganigh fogham, azenir kam ko azenir gɨn izamimɨn, ia dagheba oparan kogham. Ia azenir kamɨn witɨn pura uari azenibar otiviba ini dar amɨ, egh mangɨ azenir pumuningɨn, ia azenir faragha ghuzimɨn dagher ovɨzir iregha aghuiba, ia dar amɨ, egh namba 3ɨn azenimɨn, ia ua ingarɨva opar damɨ. Egh ia uaghan wainɨn ovɨzibar amɨsɨ, wainɨn ikarɨziba oparɨva, dar ovɨzibar amam.
